Test.title: Home
Test.description: Allows you to change stream names and host in-app
Test.name: Home

Test.title: Publish
Test.description: Simple publish example!
Test.name: Publish

Test.title: Publish - High sample rate
Test.description: Simple publish example with high audio sample rate
Test.name: Publish - High Sample Rate

Test.title: Publish - 1080p
Test.description: A high quality publisher
Test.name: Publish - 1080p

Test.title: Publish - ABR
Test.description: A high quality publisher with AdaptiveBitrateController
Test.name: Publish - ABR

Test.title: Publish - Aspect Ratio
Test.description: Publish example that includes manipulation of the preview display's aspect ratio
Test.name: Publish - Aspect Ratio

Test.title: Publish - Authentication
Test.description: An authenticated publish example.
Test.name: Publish - Authentication

Test.title: Publish - Background
Test.description: An example that continues publishing from the background.
Test.name: Publish - Background

Test.title: Publish - Camera2
Test.description: Publish example for the camera2 api
Test.name: Publish - Camera2

Test.title: Publish - Camera Swap
Test.description: Touch the screen to swap which camera is being used!
Test.name: Publish - Camera Swap

Test.title: Publish - Camera Swap Blink
Test.description: Touch the screen to swap which camera is being used! Blanks the video to hide rendering issues.
Test.name: Publish - Camera Swap Blink

Test.title: Publish - Camera Swap + Device Orientation
Test.description: Orientation with Camera Swap support.
Test.name: Publish - Camera Swap + Device Orientation

Test.title: Publish - Custom Audio Source
Test.description: Uses a custom controller to modify the microphone input, changing its volume over time.
Test.name: Publish - Custom Audio Source

Test.title: Publish - Custom Video Source
Test.description: Uses a custom controller to supply video data to the publisher.
Test.name: Publish - Custom Video Source

Test.title: Publish - Device Orientation
Test.description: Rotate the device for orientation changes. Verify with flash, android, or other iOS device running subscribe test.
Test.name: Publish - Device Orientation

Test.title: Publish - Encrypted
Test.description: An example that encrypts all traffic between the device and server.
Test.name: Publish - Encrypted

Test.title: Publish - HQ Audio
Test.description: A publish example with high quality audio
Test.name: Publish - HQ Audio

Test.title: Publish - Image Capture
Test.description: Touch the publish stream to take a screen shot that is displayed!
Test.name: Publish - Image Capture

Test.title: Publish - Local Record
Test.description: A publish example that saves a recording of the stream to the device.
Test.name: Publish - Local Record

Test.title: Publish - Orientation
Test.description: Touch the screen to rotate the output video 90 degrees. Verify with flash, android, or other iOS device running subscribe test.
Test.name: Publish - Orientation

Test.title: Publish - Pause
Test.description: Mute/Unmute Audio and Video!
Test.name: Publish - Pause

Test.title: Publish - Record
Test.description: A publish example that records stream data on the server.
Test.name: Publish - Record

Test.title: Publish - Remote Call
Test.description: The publish portion of the remote call example - sends the remote call
Test.name: Publish - Remote Call

Test.title: Publish - Stream Manager
Test.description: A publish example that connects to a cluster server with the Stream Manager.
Test.name: Publish - Stream Manager

Test.title: Publish - Stream Manager Encrypted
Test.description: A publish example that connects to a cluster server with the Stream Manager using SRTP encryption.
Test.name: Publish - Stream Manager Encrypted

Test.title: Publish - Stream Manager Transcoder
Test.description: A publish example that uses transcoding broadcast over Stream Manager.
Test.name: Publish - Stream Manager Transcoder

Test.title: Shared Objects
Test.description: Stream and chat example with shared objects.
Test.name: Shared Objects

Test.title: Shared Object - Streamless
Test.description: Chat example with shared objects that doesn't require an active stream.
Test.name: Shared Object - Streamless

Test.title: Subscribe
Test.description: Simple Subscribe Test!
Test.name: Subscribe

Test.title: Subscribe - Aspect Ratio
Test.description: Change the fill mode of the stream. scale to fill, scale to fit, scale fill. Aspect ratio should be maintained on first 2.
Test.name: Subscribe - Aspect Ratio

Test.title: Subscribe - Authentication
Test.description: An authenticated subscriber example.
Test.name: Subscribe - Authentication

Test.title: Subscribe - Background
Test.description: An example of running a subscribe example in a separate process so that it can continue when the application loses focus
Test.name: Subscribe - Background

Test.title: Subscribe - Bandwidth Test
Test.description: Detect Insufficient and Sufficient BW flags. Test on a poor network using a publisher that has high video quality. Video should become sporadic or stop altogether. The screen will darken when no video is being received.
Test.name: Subscribe - Bandwidth Test

Test.title: Subscribe - Cluster
Test.description: An example of conecting to a cluster server.
Test.name: Subscribe - Cluster

Test.title: Subscribe - Encrypted
Test.description: An example that encrypts all traffic between the device and server.
Test.name: Subscribe - Encrypted

Test.title: Subscribe - Hardware Acceleration
Test.description: Subscribe test using hardware acceleration for decoding.
Test.name: [hw] subscribe - Hardware Acceleration

Test.title: Subscribe - Image Capture
Test.description: Touch the subscribe stream to take a screen shot that is displayed
Test.name: Subscribe - Image Capture

Test.title: Subscribe - No View
Test.description: A proof of using an audio only stream without attaching it to a view.
Test.name: Subscribe - No View

Test.title: Subscribe - Mute Audio
Test.description: Simple Subscribe Mute Audio Test!
Test.name: Subscribe - Mute Audio

Test.title: Subscribe - Reconnect
Test.description: Simple Subscribe Reconnection test. Touch to disconnect/reconnect!
Test.name: Subscribe - Reconnect

Test.title: Subscribe - Remote Call
Test.description: The subscribe portion of the remote call example - receives the remote call
Test.name: Subscribe - Remote Call

Test.title: Subscribe - Renderer RGB
Test.description: Subscribe test forcing RGB scalar for decoding.
Test.name: [hw] subscribe - Renderer RGB

Test.title: Subscribe - Set Volume
Test.description: Set playback volume on a subscriber.
Test.name: Subscribe - Set Volume

Test.title: Subscribe - Stream Manager
Test.description: A subscribe example that connects to a cluster server with the Stream Manager.
Test.name: Subscribe - Stream Manager

Test.title: Subscribe - Stream Manager Encrypted
Test.description: A subscribe example that connects to a cluster server with the Stream Manager using SRTP encryption.
Test.name: Subscribe - Stream Manager Encrypted

Test.title: Subscribe - Stream Manager Transcoder
Test.description: A subscribe example that connects to a cluster server with the Stream Manager using ABR.
Test.name: Subscribe - Stream Manager Transcoder

Test.title: Subscribe - Two Stream
Test.description: Allows subscribing to two streams at one - allows user to watch presentation co-authored by two people using the two way example.
Test.name: Subscribe - Two Stream

Test.title: Conference
Test.description: Join a virtual room, publish while subscribing to multiple other participants.
Test.name: Conference

Test.title: Conference - Stream Manager
Test.description: Join a virtual room, publish while subscribing to multiple other participants over Stream Manager.
Test.name: Conference - Stream Manager

Test.title: Bandwidth Detection
Test.description: Detect download and upload bandwidth prior to subscribing to a stream.
Test.name: BandwidthDetection

Test.title: Bandwidth Detection - Download Only
Test.description: Detect download bandwidth prior to subscribing to a stream.
Test.name: BandwidthDetectionDownloadOnly

Test.title: Bandwidth Detection - Upload Only
Test.description: Detect upload bandwidth prior to publishing a stream.
Test.name: BandwidthDetectionUploadOnly
